snippet.title: Mega City Police - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Mega City Police is OUT NOW!

Dive into Retrowave Action with Droid Bishop, Timecop1983, sublunar, Nightcrawler music, and more!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2259210/Mega_City_Police/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/mega-city-police-22a245
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/mega_city_police

Retrowave Skill-Based Action Roguelike about tough cops fighting crime and keeping peace the old-fashioned way. Choose your cop and dive into hardcore action against enemies and bosses using a huge arsenal and special abilities that will define your playstyle. The law will make crime bleed.

► Twitter: https://twitter.com/MegaCity_Police
► Discord: https://discord.gg/apHVhen24g
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@megacitypolice
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/megacitypolice
